body_html:
@MattGrimes had some trouble finding the publish button in the new UI until I pointed it out to him. I think there's two minor improvements we could make here:

  1. After approving a revision, users have to go back to the recipe details page to publish the recipe, although publishing immediately after reviewing is a common user flow. Maybe we should redirect users back to that page after approving a review? Or maybe the review page should show a publish button if the recipe is eligible to be published?

  2. On the recipe details page, the publish button blends in with the edit/clone buttons a bit too well. Maybe we should relocate it, or maybe make it green?
title: Make publish button stand out?
